Font.getEscHeightY

Function/Meaning
Vertical Y-coordinate displacement of characters
Type
Method of the Font class
Syntax
getEscHeightY(text)
Arguments
text Specifies the string for which you want to obtain the vertical Y-coordinate displacement.
Return Value
Returns the vertical Y-coordinate displacement of the characters in pixels
Description
Obtains the displacement of the character drawing position required when drawing the specified characters with the current font settings.
This method obtains the displacement on the Y-coordinate when moving vertically (downward) relative to the character drawing direction.
Reference
Font.getEscWidthX
Font.getEscWidthY
Font.getEscHeightX
